```{r}

format_data <- function(data) {
  data %>% 
  rename(tweets = tweet) %>%
  mutate(class = ifelse(sarcastic == 1,"sarcasm",'regular')) %>%
  select(tweets, class)
}

train <- format_data(train)
test <- format_data(test)

write.csv(train,'Datasets/ISarcasm/train.csv')
write.csv(test,'Datasets/ISarcasm/test.csv')
```
